snippet: HIRAMOTO--Yoshio. February 9, 1928, died April 23, 2016. He was the beloved husband of Mihoko, Violet and Yuriko and father of Takanori and Keiko. Private family service will be held in Japan. Correspondence to: Keiko Skinner, 9 Lakeridge Dr., Georgetown, MA 01833. 1/3
lead_paragraph: HIRAMOTO--Yoshio. February 9, 1928, died April 23, 2016. He was the beloved husband of Mihoko, Violet and Yuriko and father of Takanori and Keiko. Private family service will be held in Japan. Correspondence to: Keiko Skinner, 9 Lakeridge Dr., Georgetown, MA 01833. 1/3
